nodes.text: Masters of the Force (Star Wars Miniatures)

Star Wars Miniatures: Masters of the Force is an expansion to the Star Wars Miniatures game by Wizards of the Coast. It was released on April 6, 2010, and is the final Star Wars miniature set. Pieces include the first Mace Windu since 2006, General Grievous prior to his cyborg transformation, Han Solo, Lando Calrissian, Darth Vader, Yoda, Cay Qel-Droma, Freedon Nadd and a Force ghost of Anakin Skywalker, with Hayden Christensen's likeness. The booster cover art was done by Terese Nielsen.
Rarity denoted as follows: Common (C), Uncommon (U), Rare (R), Very Rare (VR)
